summary: A unit-test module that builds lightweight dummy components to quickly validate the Stable Diffusion ControlNet inpainting pipeline enhanced with Prompt Attention Guidance, covering configuration parsing, enable/disable toggles, and unconditional generation paths.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the AI imageâ€‘inpainting service that uses ControlNet and Prompt Attention Guidance, enabling reliable deployment and maintenance of the generation pipeline.
